Plot: A bromance for the ages, Soul Mates is the story of two kindred spirits trapped in a cycle of death and rebirth. Across different lifetimes with no knowledge of their past lives, they are forever drawn together as mates.
Title: Soul Mates
Writer: Nicholas Boshier, Christiaan Van Vuuren, Connor Van Vuuren
Actors: Nicholas Boshier, Christiaan Van Vuuren, Rachel House, Isaro Kayitesi
